text.headline: BS in Computer Science
text.text: This was the time I started off my college journey, majoring in Computer Science with a minor in Software Engineering

text.headline: First Paid Job
text.text: I started my professional jounrey with my first padi job as a Student Orientation Leader for the University Of Cincinnati

text.headline: IOS app dev co-op
text.text: My first co-op with a company based in Oak Brook, Illinois, where I worked a full-stack IOS app developed co-op. THe most exciting part of this co-op was demoing our final project to the CEO and the stakeholders.

text.headline: Data Analyst co-op co-op
text.text: Started my second co-op with Delta Air Lines as a Data Analyst co-op with the Supply Chain department of Techincal Operations.

text.headline: Data Science co-op co-op
text.text: Started my third co-op with same company by internally transferring to a Data science focused team in Peredective Technology department of Technical Operations.

text.headline: Data Science co-op co-op
text.text: Started my fourth co-op with same company and Data science focused team in Peredective Technology department of Technical Operations.
